Posts.Content: his psa in 10/10 was 4.2 , gleason 7. Another psa was done in dec after a DRI exam, so he is having that redone, that came back at 5.2
Posts.Title: prostate cancer and acromegaly

Posts.Content: Wondering if anyone has the both at the same time. Husband diagnosis recent PC and Acromegaly ( pituitary gland produces to much growth hormone) ? Have been to both Urologist and endocrinologist. Both docotors only handle there department. He did get his testosterone levels tested and they came back " lower than normal" . They want him to treat the PC ( surgery) before they do the head surgey for the acromegaly ( pitutary tumor in the head)
